title: SOLD: 1912 Photo Art Shop PC Red Sox Champions
author: calvindog

posts.post_title: SOLD: 1912 Photo Art Shop PC Red Sox Champions
posts.post_content:
[url=https://flic.kr/p/CVRGay][img]https://farm5.staticflickr.com/4494/24238313538_b7b2340db7_c.jpg[/img][/url]

1912 Photo Art Shop real-photo postcard featuring the 1912 Boston Red Sox, featuring Tris Speaker, Harry Hooper and Joe Wood.  At the bottom of the card reads "Season 1912 - Champions Of The American League - Boston Red Sox." This card was produced by The Photo Art Shop of Swampsott, Massachusetts.  Very sharp looking card, very rare, just three graded by SGC.  

email or PM me if interested.
